display_long_description:
**Squash, Shoot, Survive!**

**Big New Update!**

-Added New Spitter Enemy

-Added Permanent Upgrade System and First Upgrade After Clearing First Wave

-Added Crack Animations and Particle Physics to Bricks
-Ball Physics Rework

Your station’s passages are plagued by extraterrestrial brick blockages and alien bug hordes invading the system. It’s up to you to clear the chaos as the hero exterminator the galaxy never knew it needed!

Will you have the skills to squash, shoot and survive, or will the bugs overrun you?


**Brick-Breaking Action:** Smash through bricks and break down barriers with your trusty paddle and ball, but don’t get too comfortable—the bugs are always lurking, waiting for their chance to swarm!

**Blast the Bug Horde:** Face off against relentless alien bugs that are bent on making sure you never escape. Use sub-machine guns, pistols and quick reflexes to outlast their attacks and keep the ball in play!

**Earn Points and Upgrade Weapons:** Earn points as you break bricks to purchase powerful weapon upgrades to help you fight off increasing numbers of enemies – Powerful weapons, Bigger mags, Improved health, Laser sight, Flashlight…and more in the works

**Roguelike Gameplay:** Every playthrough is unique with randomly generated levels, offering new challenges each time you play
Early access: Explore early stages as the game continues to grow with feedback from the community – new weapons, enemies, and upgrades.
